org.apache.cassandra.db

Class ColumnFamilyStoreCQLHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.db.ColumnFamilyStoreCQLHelper

  • public class ColumnFamilyStoreCQLHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods to represent CFMetadata and related objects in CQL format

      • dumpReCreateStatements

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> dumpReCreateStatements(CFMetaData metadata)

      • getCFMetadataAsCQL

        public static java.lang.String getCFMetadataAsCQL(CFMetaData metadata,
                                                  boolean includeDroppedColumns)
        Build a CQL String representation of Column Family Metadata

      • getUserTypesAsCQL

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getUserTypesAsCQL(CFMetaData metadata)
        Build a CQL String representation of User Types used in the given Column Family. Type order is ensured as types are built incrementally: from the innermost (most nested) to the outermost.

      • getDroppedColumnsAsCQL

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDroppedColumnsAsCQL(CFMetaData metadata)
        Build a CQL String representation of Dropped Columns in the given Column Family. If the column was dropped once, but is now re-created `ADD` will be appended accordingly.

      • getIndexesAsCQL

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getIndexesAsCQL(CFMetaData metadata)
        Build a CQL String representation of Indexes on columns in the given Column Family

      • isCqlCompatible

        public static boolean isCqlCompatible(CFMetaData metaData)
        Whether or not the given metadata is compatible / representable with CQL Language
